title: Azir ward audio playing new Taric.
body: So I'm trying out the fabulous new Taric, and he's super fun but... I have an ally Azir, and every time he places a ward I hear his quote as though I was the one playing him. Is this intended or?

replies.body:
It IS intended.  They realized that Azir players are sub-par in warding and now you can get on them properly if you only hear them do it once or twice a match.

This will be the rule for EVERY champ next patch.

Hey Get Blobbed -

Thanks for the report! This shouldn't be global. D:
To be honest, I rather enjoy it

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=vv8EEHAH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-21T16:36:08.564+0000)
>
> Hey Get Blobbed -
> 
> Thanks for the report! This shouldn't be global. D:

Thanks for the response! Glad I could help.
